document.full_text: at least half the u.s. public approves of president barack obama's military action in libya, despite growing criticism from republicans and some democrats in congress, recent polling finds.
document.title: half or more of u.s. public supports obama on libya
lines_and_colors: at least half the u.s. public approves of president barack obama's military action in libya, despite growing criticism from republicans and some democrats in congress, recent polling finds.
